data.comment: Today's referee, Allen Chapman, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Allen Chapman, has blown to start the match.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Houston's area.
Houston advance rapidly upfield but Allen Chapman blows for offside.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
Houston's Adam Lundqvist breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Kansas City.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston surge into the attack at Children's Mercy Park but Maynor Figueroaâ€™s header is off-target.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Houston to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Kiki Struna (Houston) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Alan Pulido gives Kansas City a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Khiry Shelton to set up the goal.
Important block from the Kansas City defence as Mauro Manotas fires in a strike for Houston.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
The match at Children's Mercy Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luis Martins, who is down injured.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Kansas City's Luis Martins looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Allen Chapman signals a Houston throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Maynor Figueroa for Houston has been booked by Allen Chapman and receives a first yellow card.
Great finish from Roger Espinoza to give Kansas City a 2-0 lead.
Alan Pulido with an assist there.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Ilie Sanchez (Kansas City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Houston's Matias Vera has been booked in Kansas City.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Adam Lundqvist (Houston) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Johnny Russell of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Allen Chapman awards Houston a goal kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Houston's Memo Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Throw-in for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Houston's half?
Throw-in Houston.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Memo Rodriguez of Houston smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
At Children's Mercy Park, Kansas City are penalized for being offside.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Kansas City pushes forward through Gadi Kinda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Allen Chapman blows against Kansas City's Alan Pulido for offside.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Houston are pushing forward but Tommy McNamara's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Children's Mercy Park, Gadi Kinda has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Darwin Quintero is replacing Tomas Martinez for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Kansas City are coming forward and Johnny Russell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Allen Chapman awards Houston a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Kansas City push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Alan Pulido gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Houston defence.
In Kansas City, Johnny Russell of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kansas City's Luis Martins fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Allen Chapman signals a Kansas City throw-in in Houston's half.
Houston needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Houston will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
Kansas City drive upfield and Alan Pulido gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Houston defender.
Goal! Gadi Kinda extends Kansas City's lead to 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Alan Pulido.
Kansas City drives forward and Khiry Shelton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Houston.
Kansas City make their first substitution with Gerso Fernandes replacing Johnny Russell.
In Kansas City, Kansas City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a second substitution, with Christian Ramirez replacing Tommy McNamara.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Gerso Fernandes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Houston.
The home team have replaced Gadi Kinda with Gianluca Busio. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Houston.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Kansas City take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Khiry Shelton.
Michael Salazar is on a sub for Memo Rodriguez for Houston.
Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Gianluca Busio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Houston have a goal kick.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Peter Vermes is making the team's third substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Erik Hurtado replacing Alan Pulido.
Kansas City's Erik Hurtado gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Houston defender.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Houston.
Houston are pushing forward but Darwin Quintero's finish is wide of the goal.
Allen Chapman awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Kansas City throw-in in Houston's half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Houston's Michael Salazar has been booked in Kansas City.
Goal kick for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
